remarks: Establish a lower bound on a Ramsey number.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Apr-2015.)
statement:
ramlb.c $e |- C = ( a e. _V , i e. NN0 |-> { b e. ~P a | ( # ` b ) = i } ) $.
ramlb.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
ramlb.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
ramlb.f $e |- ( ph -> F : R --> NN0 ) $.
ramlb.s $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
ramlb.g $e |- ( ph -> G : ( ( 1 ... N ) C M ) --> R ) $.
ramlb.i $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( c e. R /\ x C_ ( 1 ... N ) ) ) -> ( ( x C M ) C_ ( `' G " { c } ) -> ( # ` x ) < ( F ` c ) ) ) $.
ramlb $p |- ( ph -> N < ( M Ramsey F ) ) $.
$d C c x $.
$d F c x $.
$d G c x $.
$d M a b c i x $.
$d N c x $.
$d R c x $.
$d V c x $.
$d c ph x $.
